answers.answer: I have only been doing it a few days, I don't find the eating hit hard but my levels are still too high! I don't want to go on insulin but if it looks after bubs that's all that matters :) just think it will all be over soon and you will have your little miracle in your arms :)

Im the same. Can seem to get my levels right unless its 1st think in the morning before food.I also have pelvic girdle pain so im absoultly terrifide of a big baby id rather the insulin if it ment hed be small enough.

It's easy just eat egg whites n turkey bacon for breakfast with oatmeal. Chicken  with grain rice n veggies for luck or dinner n snack on almonds. U can even get the coco powder covered almonds not the chocolate covered ones. N just have a few like 5 just to kill cravings.
I meant lunch not luck sorry.

See my big problem is iv i.b.s aswell always have and all this foods im ment to eat isnt agreeing with me at all. And the rest of it the baby obviously doesnt like coz it makes me sick.... Im hoping to talk to the dietian next friday at my next blood tests to sort all this out.Tell u what its not that im ungrateful to be pregnant but i cant wait till this is all over.

See my big problem is iv i.b.s aswell always have and all this foods im ment to eat isnt agreeing with me at all. And the rest of it the baby obviously doesnt like coz it makes me sick.... Im hoping to talk to the dietian next friday at my next blood tests to sort all this out.Tell u what its not that im ungrateful to be pregnant but i cant wait till this is all over.

My sugars have sky rocketed. I've been following my diet and exercise. Im Going to see a new doctor on friday, I'll probably be put on more Insulin. My gyno said twords the end you can spike, and it's the most important time to keep things in check

Im 30weeks today and havent been able to get my dinner sugars right yesterday i was 8.8 when its ment to be under 7.Breakfast has also been high untill today. 1st bloods where 3.4(fasting) and after breakfast was 5.4 which is kinda low.Ill be back at the hospital on friday so i can ask them all about it then i just hope im not doing to much damage untill then?I actually thought this would be easy enough to understandGood  luck patricksmommy let me know how u get on.

I know for me they wanted me to go in as soon As possible. But couldn't get me in till Friday as well. So I'm just making sure I stay on top of everything as best I can. It's fusterating  that they want you to stay on top of it, but it's a week before you can actually get to see someone :/
Thank you hailz, I wish you luck too! And keep me posted on yourself!!!
There's another group on FB that deals with only gestational diabetes it's called "gestational diabetes" look it up very helpful !!!

Brilliant thanks i will. Im really having an awful time trying to get the hang of this. On sat i was constantly under 4 untill after a big dinner which was under 6 and since then iv been up in the 9s. Yesterday was 9.9.Im following the diet to a T so im getting very stressed out now

Hailz I hope your doing better.I met with my new doctor today. I'm being put on insulin 4xs a day and going to keep in touch every few days to get my numbers back in check. I definitely like this doctor and how on top of it she is, and making me feel less guilty  (I know it's not my fault,but I still feel like it is)On the plus, my baby is doing great. His weight and all measurements are great. So that's a huge relief

Thats great that ur happier with ur new doctor. I no its suck just to have gestational diabetes in gerneal but at least ur doing everything possible to keep on top of it.Thats fantastic news about ur little man!I was back for my check up yesterday in the diabetes clinic and i told them all my concerns and what iv been going true... they werent worried about my numbers and said because i can exersize that im doing the best i can. The only thing they where worried about is that iv been ln losing weight, 2kg in two weeks, so were all going to monitor it closely and i just need to try eat more protien related foods.Wishing u luck with the insulin,Keep in touch.

I guess it's a good thing they don't seem to concerned, just keep on  doing what your doing.  I heard alot of GD mommies lose weight because of the diet, so hopefully that is the case with you.I have such a issue with proteins. That's my struggle. I luckily found a bunch of drinks and food bars that have been helping.I packed a bag of cookies in my hospital bag to indulge on when I have him. That will be my motivation!! ;)

I hope so they just seemed concerned coz im not excersizing but its dropping pretty quick. Iv lost .7kg in 2days even tho im eating a good bit.Im the same iv been very good with coffee(havent had any since day 1) so i told the other half everyday he comes in to bring a coffee and a diffrent sugary treat. HahaIm finding it very hard here to get things i can eat and drink but i did discover that i can have eddie rockets i get an ice burger(has no buns) and it bearly rasises my levels

question: Hi guys anyone out there with gd finding it hard to keep ur blood sugars down while eating.Im finding dinner and breakfast the hardest and even tho im trying really hard im constantly hungry!!The past 2 days after dinner its been nearly 2points to highSame from breakfast.How am i ment to do this for 10weeks? All i want is to have a hug big bag of chips!
title: gestational diabetes
